d.f: `傳統~`音樂~`中的~`記~`音符~`號~，`相當於~`簡譜~`中的~「7」。`參見~【`工尺~】。

Deutsch: der zweite der zehn "Himmelsstämme" des chinesischen Kalenders (S)
Radikal Nr. 5 = Sichel  (Varianten: 乚, 乛)
English: second of the ten Heavenly Stems `十~`天干~[shi2 tian1 gan1]
letter "B" or roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc
second party (in legal contract, usually `乙~`方~[yi3 fang1], as opposed to `甲方~[jia3 fang1])
